rules.title: Verify Patient Status
rules.action: Ask patient if they are new or established.
rules.example: Hello, thank you for calling. Are you a new patient or an established patient with us?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.action: Verbally acknowledge the patient's stated status.
rules.example: Okay, thank you for letting me know you're an established patient.

rules.title: Request Established Patient ID
rules.action: Ask for identifying information to pull up their chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could I please have your phone number or date of birth?

rules.title: Inform Chart Retrieval
rules.condition: After receiving identifying information from an established patient.
rules.action: Inform patient about chart retrieval and ask them to hold.
rules.example: Please give me just a moment while I pull up your chart.

rules.title: Offer Appointment Slots
rules.condition: After patient identification/verification and understanding the patient's scheduling need.
rules.action: Present available dates and times for appointments based on doctor availability.
rules.example: Okay, Dr. Sharma has openings on November 10th at 10 AM or 2 PM. Which time works best for you?

rules.title: Confirm Selected Appointment
rules.condition: After the patient selects a preferred appointment slot.
rules.action: Verbally confirm the chosen doctor, date, and time with the patient.
rules.example: Just to confirm, you'd like to schedule an appointment with Dr. Sharma on November 10th at 2 PM. Is that correct?

rules.title: Offer Additional Assistance Post-Confirmation
rules.condition: After an appointment has been successfully confirmed.
rules.action: Proactively ask the patient if there is anything else they need assistance with.
rules.example: Your appointment is now confirmed. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
